channel.title: Python on Owen Smith
channel.description: Recent content in Python on Owen Smith

item.title: This was supposed to be just a weekend project...
item.description: A simple side project Castlemates was supposed to be just a weekend project. I had no idea that the repository would hit over 230 unique vistors and over 650 upvotes on Reddit in just over a day. I had an idea to build a python script which scrapes .pgn (portable game notation) files for chess games which end in a checkmate by castling. Pretty simple idea. The script itself took no longer than an hour to implement but downloading and processing what ended up being over 900 million games (1.
